title: Instructional Design Incorporating Music Effects in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and general understanding of music appreciation
context.additional_context: Need for music integration strategies optimized for smartphone-based learning environments: motivational and concentration enhancement when delivering social studies content

learning_goals: Learners can explain the effects of music on motivation and concentration enhancement in online learning environments
Learners can select and apply appropriate background music to aid understanding of social studies content
Learners can improve learning efficiency by over 20% by self-directing music-integrated learning strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
